title: 13: The Sacred & The Profane
itunes:title: 13: The Sacred & The Profane
itunes:subtitle: In this episode of Very Bad Words, Evelyn Dean-Olmstead returns to help Matt explore how religion and mothers shape the way we swear.Guests: Anton Bonnici, Francois Gratton, Evelyn Dean-Olmstead
description:
In this episode of Very Bad Words, Evelyn Dean-Olmstead returns to help Matt explore how religion and mothers shape the way we swear.

Guests: Anton Bonnici, Francois Gratton, Evelyn Dean-Olmstead
